name: Mirrors Of Chaos
description:
-------------------------------------------

WHAT IS THE GAME ABOUT?

Mirrors Of Chaos is a short but sweet roguelike bullet hell game where the player is the main threat. You will constantly be attacked by a copy of yourself, and it will take many tries to overcome it. 

-------------------------------------------

DETAILS

The game took roughly 80 hours to develop, spanning from March 23  - April 4 of 2023. I don't plan on updating it, but if the game is well received then I might.  Feedback is always appreciated, as I learn from it. The game will always be free.

-------------------------------------------

CREDITS

Everything was created by me, and I used the following softwares/websites to make the game and its assets:

Unreal Engine 4 - Game Engine

Blender - 3D Modeling Software

Microsoft Paint - Icons

JSFXR - Sound Effects

-------------------------------------------
